hero.title: Powerful Features

q1.question: Is MultiSave free to use?
q1.answer: Yes, MultiSave is completely free to use. You can download unlimited Instagram content without any charges.

q2.question: Do I need to create an account?
q2.answer: No, you don't need to create an account or log in. Simply paste the Instagram URL and start downloading.

q3.question: What types of content can I download?
q3.answer: You can download Instagram Reels, posts, photos, videos, and carousel posts in original quality.

q4.question: Is it safe to use?
q4.answer: Absolutely! We don't store any of your personal data or downloaded content. Your privacy is our priority.

q5.question: Why isn't my download working?
q5.answer: Make sure the Instagram post is public and the URL is correct. Private accounts cannot be accessed.
